entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Winterland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 8:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: 43 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 8 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
